task: Browse Booking's homepage to find out which company it belongs to.
observation:
This summary reflects the most recent observations. The user visited the Booking.com 'About' page by navigating to https://www.booking.com/content/about.html. The page provides the information that Booking.com is part of Booking Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ: BKNG), which is a leader in online travel and related services. This detail confirms the ownership of Booking.com by Booking Holdings Inc. Additionally, Booking.com is indicated as operating internationally, with a wide reach in various cities and countries globally.
